name: THAI DICT
description: High performance Thai English and English Thai dictionary + translator for your Android device. Now, has more than 500,000 dictionary word entries.  Advance word lookup, help you discovery more related words. Full synonyms , antonyms , relevant word and Thesaurus support. High Quality voice and pronunciation. Voice Search support. Vocabulary pictures support. Share your translations with other apps. Save your most frequent translations for later. Translate text in other apps through context menu translation.  Online Google Translate, Longman Dictionary, Oxford Dictionary, Collins Dictionary, Merriam-Webster Dictionary, Youdao Dictionary , Longdo included.  Companion tool for study language or travel abroad.   This product is created by adaptation of LEXiTRON developed by NECTEC Thailand www.nectec.or.th   More than 3,000,000 copies downloaded!!  Now support Chinese Japnese French Spanish German Laos Translation!  For more FREE Thai Dict , You can also download here... https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.thana.thaidictquick https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.thana.thaidict  Translator supports the following languages: Arabic, Bangla,Catalan, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Filipino, Finnish, French, German, Greek,Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese,Korean,Malay, Maltese, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tahitian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese  all languages.
